title: Mobile Application Developer
shortDescription: Developed Flutter apps (Side Hustle, AcademIQ, Diecarz) with secure authentication, tracking SDKs (Singular, AppsFlyer, Adjust), and scalable Firebase integrations.
Built AI-powered chat features using ChatGPT APIs with structured outputs, custom modes, and offline support via Isar DB while ensuring clean architecture across sprints.

title: Software Engineer
shortDescription: Contributed to AI Planner and Caregiver Management App, integrating ChatGPT (GPT-4.1) with structured outputs and parallel function calling for automated scheduling.
Migrated from Claude 3.5/3.7 to OpenAI APIs with dynamic model switching, refactored state management, and improved UI performance and feature stability.
